title: Darning Sampler, 1801
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and four-sided cross stitch with overcasting over withdrawn element work on plain weave foundation
inscribed: I C L H C F
description: Twenty-one darning squares.  Decorative insert patch in the center.  The letters I C L H C F and the date under a crown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Darning Sampler, 1801.
1801. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and four-sided cross stitch with overcasting over withdrawn element work on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-204.
